mapper.select: /* sys.local.storage.sync.selectSyncInfo */ SELECT SyncID AS syncId, SyncTime, SyncDate FROM covi_smart4j.sys_local_storage_sync ORDER BY SyncDate DESC LIMIT 1

/* sys.local.storage.sync.selectSyncTarget */ SELECT DomainId , DicCode
, COALESCE(KoFull, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(EnFull, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(ZhFull, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(JaFull, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(Lang1Full, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(Lang2Full, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(Lang3Full, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(Lang4Full, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(Lang5Full, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(Lang6Full, '') AS Message
, COALESCE(KoFull, '') AS Message
FROM covi_smart4j.SYS_BASE_DICTIONARY WHERE IsUse = 'Y' AND DomainID = #{domainId}
